characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective from the local precinct who's always first on the scene at any murder investigation.

characters.name: Di-Jun Wang
characters.description1: The current president of Zheng Fa. An attempt was made on his life as he gave a speech at an event held in his honor.

characters.name: Tabby Lloyd
characters.description1: A journalist who attended the president's speech hoping to snap up a scoop.

characters.name: Kay Faraday
characters.description1: A self-styled Great Thief and so-called "second Yatagarasu" who's always looking to bag the greatest treasure of all -- the truth.

characters.name: John Doe → Shelly de Killer
characters.description1: An ice cream seller who's currently my prime suspect. He certainly ticks all the right boxes...
characters.description2: A professional assassin who appears to have some kind of connection to the victim.
characters.description3: A professional assassin who attempted to kill the president two days ago. Rook managed to intercept him then, and injure his left arm.

characters.name: Bronco Knight
characters.description1: Second-in-command of the president's security detail. Appears to be something of a specialist when it comes to handling firearms.
characters.description2: Second-in-command of the president's security detail. An injury means that he is unable to turn his head to his right.

characters.name: Bastian Rook
characters.description1: The victim. He was the leader of the president's security detail, and appears to have died in the line of duty.

characters.name: Kay Faraday
characters.description1: A self-styled Great Thief and so-called "second Yatagarasu" who's always looking to bag the greatest treasure of all -- the truth.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective from the local precinct who's always first on the scene at any murder investigation.

characters.name: Bronco Knight
characters.description1: A former bodyguard who killed his team leader. He is set to stand trial soon.
characters.description2: The victim. He was killed while being detained in the detention center's holding cells. His body was discovered in the prison proper.

characters.name: Eddie Fender
characters.description1: A defense attorney I have known for a long time, but haven't seen in years. Apparently, he lived abroad for a while.
characters.description2: Senior partner at Edgeworth and Co., and former assistant to my father. Also Simeon Saint's attorney.

characters.name: Rocco Carcerato
characters.description1: An inmate and former boxer who is obsessed with training. Has a pet polar bear named Teddy.
characters.description2: An inmate and former boxer who has dug a tunnel to the detention center from his cell and made his escape. Has a pet polar bear.
characters.description3: An inmate obsessed with escaping. A tunnel links his cell to Knight's holding cell.

characters.name: Verity Gavèlle
characters.description1: A district court judge and member of the Committee for Prosecutorial Excellence, who also acts as its mouthpiece.

characters.name: Eustace Winner
characters.description1: A rookie prosecutor who's taken over my cases on the Committee's orders.

characters.name: Simeon Saint
characters.description1: The suspect in this case. A timid young man who seems an unlikely murderer.
characters.description2: The suspect in this case. A trainee animal tamer at the Berry Big Circus.

characters.name: Fifi Laguarde
characters.description1: Warden of the prison. An animal lover who considers physical contact to be very important.

characters.name: Frank Sahwit
characters.description1: The prison inmate who first discovered the body. Currently training to be a pet stylist.
characters.description2: Prisoner and trainee pet stylist who first discovered the body. His security bracelet is broken.

characters.name: Bodhidharma Kanis
characters.description1: A blind ex-assassin whose favored tools were a black dog and a knife. The tinkling of small bells used to accompany his appearance.

characters.name: Shi-Long Lang
characters.description1: An Interpol agent with an unrivaled arrest rate. Originally from Zheng Fa.

characters.name: Regina Berry
characters.description1: Head animal trainer at the Berry Big Circus, and Saint's boss.

characters.name: Eddie Fender
characters.description1: A student working part-time at the offices of Edgeworth and Co. Studying to be an attorney.
characters.description2: Senior partner at Edgeworth and Co., and former assistant to my father. He worked the original IS-7 Incident.

characters.name: Samson Tangaroa
characters.description1: My client, and a man said to be the greatest confectioner of his generation.
characters.description2: Having received a guilty verdict for his purported role in the IS-7 Incident, he is now serving out his prison sentence.

characters.name: Artie Frost
characters.description1: The murder victim. Found dead inside Samson Tangaroa's chocolate work.
characters.description2: The murder victim. Gained fame as a sculptor in France under a pseudonym.
characters.description3: Victim of the IS-7 Incident. His body went missing not long after it was discovered.

characters.name: Judy Bound
characters.description1: Assistant to Samson Tangaroa. She's fond of the work of sculptor Paul Halique.
characters.description2: Former assistant to Samson Tangaroa and current owner of the Zodiac Hall art gallery. She loves to sing and dance.

characters.name: Tyrell Badd
characters.description1: The detective assigned to this case. A man of few words.

characters.name: Carmelo Gusto
characters.description1: A candy-crafting confectioner who's taking part in the contest.
characters.description2: A confectioner who, having breathed in poisonous gas, was found collapsed outside the Autumn Wing.

characters.name: Delicia Scone
characters.description1: A confectioner who will do whatever it takes to achieve her goals.
characters.description2: A confectioner of indeterminate age. Back home in the U.K., they call her Ms. Delicious.
characters.description3: A British pharmacist of indeterminate age who can't resist sweet foods.

characters.name: Manfred von Karma
characters.description1: The prosecutor in charge of this case. It is said that he has never lost a trial in these past 25 years.

characters.name: Laurice Deauxnim
characters.description1: Pseudonym of Larry Butz, my friend since childhood. He fancies himself as something of an artist.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective from the local precinct who's always first on the scene at any murder investigation.

characters.name: Kay Faraday
characters.description1: A self-styled Great Thief and so-called "second Yatagarasu" who's always looking to bag the greatest treasure of all -- the truth.

characters.name: Verity Gavèlle
characters.description1: A district court judge and member of the Committee for Prosecutorial Excellence, who also acts as its mouthpiece.

characters.name: Eustace Winner
characters.description1: The greatest prosecutor ever to prosecute... according to himself, anyway. In actual fact, his relationship with logic is tenuous at best.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective from the local precinct who's always first on the scene at any murder investigation.

characters.name: Florence Niedler
characters.description1: A nurse who works at Hertz Hospital. Has a worrying tendency to offer unnecessary treatments to everyone she meets.

characters.name: Kay Faraday
characters.description1: A mysterious young woman brought to the High Prosecutors' Offices by Florence Niedler. She appears to have lost her memory, but...
characters.description2: A self-styled Great Thief and so-called "second Yatagarasu". She's currently suffering from memory loss.

characters.name: Hilda Hertz
characters.description1: The head of Hertz Hospital. Carried out the preliminary inspection of the victim in this case.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: Daughter of my mentor, Manfred von Karma. She is a highly talented prosecutor, and is currently working with Interpol.

characters.name: Eustace Winner
characters.description1: The greatest prosecutor ever to prosecute... according to himself, anyway. In actual fact, his relationship with logic is tenuous at best.

characters.name: Verity Gavèlle
characters.description1: A district court judge and member of the Committee for Prosecutorial Excellence, who also acts as its mouthpiece.

characters.name: Rosie Ringer
characters.description1: The victim in this case. She was a defense attorney, and served on the Committee alongside Judge Gavèlle.

characters.name: Excelsius Winner
characters.description1: Former chief prosecutor, current Chairman of the Committee, and Eustace Winner's father. Has a tendency to burst into tears over nothing.

characters.name: Eddie Fender
characters.description1: Senior partner at Edgeworth and Co. He's trying to get me to become a defense attorney.

characters.name: Ema Skye
characters.description1: A high school student looking to become a forensic investigator, and the younger sister of my former boss.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: A freelance photojournalist who I've met in the past. Known for her ability to sniff out scoops and snap them with her trusty camera.

characters.name: Kay Faraday
characters.description1: A self-styled Great Thief and so-called "second Yatagarasu" who's always looking to bag the greatest treasure of all -- the truth.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: A freelance photojournalist who I've met in the past. Known for her ability to sniff out scoops and snap them with her trusty camera.

characters.name: Shi-Long Lang
characters.description1: An Interpol agent with an unrivaled arrest rate. Originally from Zheng Fa.

characters.name: Di-Jun Wang
characters.description1: President of Zheng Fa, and the victim in this case. His body was found on a film set.
characters.description2: The victim in this case. A body double who took the real President Wang's place after he murdered him 12 years ago.

characters.name: Crew Member
characters.description1: A props person at Global Studios, and the first to discover the body. Her name is Penny Nichols.

characters.name: Shaun Fenn
characters.description1: The child star of the monster movie being filmed. Mature for his age with a menacing demeanor.
characters.description2: The child star of the monster movie being filmed. Revealed to be President Wang's son. His mother's name was Amelie Fenn.

characters.name: Verity Gavèlle
characters.description1: A judge, and a member of the Committee for Prosecutorial Excellence. Suspected of being involved in the president's murder.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective from the local precinct who's always first on the scene at any murder investigation.

characters.name: Eddie Fender
characters.description1: Senior partner at Edgeworth and Co. Acting as Fifi Laguarde's attorney in place of Rosie Ringer.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: Daughter of my mentor, Manfred von Karma. She is a highly talented prosecutor, and is currently working with Interpol.

characters.name: Eustace Winner
characters.description1: A rookie prosecutor who thinks he's a real winner. Ran off in shock after discovering that his father is a criminal.

characters.name: Fifi Laguarde
characters.description1: A former prison warden. She is currently on trial for the murder of Bronco Knight.

characters.name: Regina Berry
characters.description1: Head animal trainer at the Berry Big Circus, and Saint's boss.

characters.name: Simeon Saint
characters.description1: An animal-tamer-in-training at the Berry Big Circus. He came to watch the trial.
characters.description2: An animal-tamer-in-training at the Berry Big Circus, who is also the criminal mastermind behind the recent string of incidents.

characters.name: Will Powers
characters.description1: An action star with Global Studios. He's playing the part of Taurusaurus in the movie that's currently being shot.

characters.name: Tabby Lloyd
characters.description1: A journalist who's always on the lookout for a scoop. Protégé of Lotta Hart.

characters.name: Excelsius Winner
characters.description1: Chairman of the Committee for Prosecutorial Excellence and the ringleader behind the underground auction. He is currently under arrest for murder.

characters.name: Bronco Knight
characters.description1: One of President Wang's bodyguards. Murdered while being held at the detention center.
characters.description2: Revealed to be Artie Frost's son. Murdered by Fifi Laguarde while being held at the detention center.

characters.name: Bodhidharma Kanis
characters.description1: A blind ex-assassin who escaped from prison three nights ago. His whereabouts are currently unknown.

characters.name: Shelly de Killer
characters.description1: A professional killer who made an attempt on President Wang's life at Gourd Lake.

characters.name: Alf Aldown
characters.description1: A freelance journalist who was murdered in the incident from 12 years ago.
characters.description2: A freelance journalist who was murdered in the incident from 12 years ago. Rosie Ringer's lover.

characters.name: Rosie Ringer
characters.description1: A member of the Committee for Prosecutorial Excellence. She was killed while attempting to avenge Alf Aldown.

characters.name: Ema Skye
characters.description1: A high school student looking to become a forensic investigator, and the younger sister of my former boss.
